Name: (licon.1)
Description: Min and max L and W of licon (exempt licons inside prec_resistor)

Name: (licon.1b)
Description: Min and max width of licon inside prec_resistor

Name: (licon.1c)
Description: Min and max length of licon inside prec_resistor

Name: (licon.2)
Description: Spacing of licon to licon

Name: (licon.2b)
Description: Min spacing between two slotted_licon (when the both the edges are 0.19um in length)

Name: (licon.2c)
Description: Min spacing between two slotted_licon (except for rule licon.2b)

Name: (licon.2d)
Description: Min spacing between a slotted_licon and 0.17um square licon

Name: (licon.3)
Description: Only min. square licons are allowed except die seal ring where licons are (licon CD)*L

Name: (licon.4)
Description: Licon1 must overlap li1 and (poly or diff or tap)

Name: (licon.5a)
Description: Enclosure of licon by diff

Name: (licon.5b)
Description: Min space between tap_licon and diff-abutting tap edge

Name: (licon.5c)
Description: Enclosure of licon by diff on one of two adjacent sides

Name: (licon.6)
Description: Licon cannot straddle tap

Name: (licon.7)
Description: Enclosure of licon by one of two adjacent edges of isolated tap

Name: (licon.8)
Description: Enclosure of poly_licon by poly

Name: (licon.8a)
Description: Enclosure of poly_licon by poly on one of two adjacent sides

Name: (licon.9)
Description: Spacing, no overlap, between poly_licon and psdm; In SKY130DIA/SKY130TMA/SKY130PIR-10 flows, the rule is checked only between (poly_licon outside rpm) and psdm

Name: (licon.10)
Description: Spacing of licon on (tap AND (nwell NOT hvi)) to Var_channel

Name: (licon.11)
Description: Spacing of licon on diff or tap to poly on diff (except for all FETs inside :drc_tag:`areaid.sc` and except s8spf-10r flow for 0.5um phv inside cell names "s8fs_gwdlvx4", "s8fs_gwdlvx8", "s8fs_hvrsw_x4", "s8fs_hvrsw8", "s8fs_hvrsw264", and "s8fs_hvrsw520" and for 0.15um nshort inside cell names "s8fs_rdecdrv", "s8fs_rdec8", "s8fs_rdec32", "s8fs_rdec264", "s8fs_rdec520")

Name: (licon.11a)
Description: Spacing of licon on diff or tap to poly on diff (for all FETs inside :drc_tag:`areaid.sc` except 0.15um phighvt)

Name: (licon.11b)
Description: Spacing of licon on diff or tap to poly on diff (for 0.15um phighvt inside :drc_tag:`areaid.sc`)

Name: (licon.11c)
Description: Spacing of licon on diff or tap to poly on diff (for 0.5um phv inside cell names "s8fs_gwdlvx4", "s8fs_gwdlvx8", "s8fs_hvrsw_x4", "s8fs_hvrsw8", "s8fs_hvrsw264", and "s8fs_hvrsw520")

Name: (licon.11d)
Description: Spacing of licon on diff or tap to poly on diff (for 0.15um nshort inside cell names "s8fs_rdecdrv", "s8fs_rdec8", "s8fs_rdec32", "s8fs_rdec264", "s8fs_rdec520")

Name: (licon.12)
Description: Max SD width without licon

Name: (licon.13)
Description: Spacing (no overlap) of NPC to licon on diff or tap

Name: (licon.14)
Description: Spacing of poly_licon to diff or tap

Name: (licon.15)
Description: poly_licon must be enclosed by npc byâ€¦

Name: (licon.16)
Description: Every source_diff and every tap must enclose at least one licon1, including the diff/tap straddling areaid:ce. \nRule exempted inside UHVI.

Name: (licon.17)
Description: Licons may not overlap both poly and (diff or tap)

Name: (licon.18)
Description: Npc must enclose poly_licon

Name: (licon.19)
Description: poly of the HV varactor must not interact with licon
